ExtendedSection.Title: The interface to manage scheduled jobs

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: In the administration view, you'll find the "Scheduled Jobs" administraion. When you click it, the "Scheduled Jobs Management" opens.

Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
The "Scheduled Jobs Management"-view provides options to create a new job (magic wand in the toolbar) and to view the list of existing jobs.

Via the context menu of a job you can

  • Edit the job
  • Activate/deactivate the job
  • Copy the job
  • Delete the job
  • Run the job manually.
